name: play-rough
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s offensive stats.
